TopicTitle: Anyone here a Smash Bros fan? Vote for Jeb!

Articles.Content: Nintendo has announced that they will be including a non-Nintendo character in the most recent smash bros game. Read more and vote for Jebediah Kerman here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115423-Jeb-in-Super-Smash-Bros%21?p=1836945#post1836945
